page--index.trackDescription: Track your growth every day, not only to see results but also to feel the inspiration on your way to success.

page--index.createTasksDescription: Plan your goals with clear tasks and pave the way to personal victories every day.
page--index.followFriends: Support your friends in their success
page--index.followFriendsDescription: It's easier to reach goals together. Follow your friends' progress and create mutual motivation for greater achievements.
page--index.viewReports: Get the full picture of your achievements
page--index.viewReportsDescription: Analyze every step to know exactly where you stand and what steps to take for further victories.
page--index.setGoalsDescription: Set clear goals and ambitious tasks so you don't stop at what you've achieved.
page--index.stayMotivatedDescription: Don't let yourself relax! Keep your energy and motivation levels high on your path to success.
page--index.celebrateSuccessDescription: Every step towards your goal is a reason to celebrate. Share your achievements and enjoy every success.

options.register_content: To register, click the 'Register' button on the homepage and fill out the form with your details to create an account.
options.add_friend_content: Go to the user's profile and click the 'Add Friend' or 'Follow' button to keep track of their updates.
options.modify_account_content: To modify your account settings or delete it, go to the 'Settings' section in the profile menu and select the relevant option.
options.create_group_content: To create a group, go to the 'Communities' section and click 'Create Community,' then fill out the form with the necessary details.
options.change_avatar_content: To change your profile picture, open the profile settings and click on your current photo. Then select a new image from your gallery.
options.change_password_content: To change your password, go to the account settings, select 'Security,' and follow the instructions to change your password.
options.recover_account_content: If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password?' on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send you instructions to recover access.
